Titles.titleNextStepsForYourCreditApproval: Next steps for your credit approval

Placeholders.placeholderEnterPurposeOfTheCredit: enter the purpose of the credit

Descriptions.textCompanyDetailsDescription: By registering, you can make specific credit requests tailored to your company's profile.
Descriptions.textApplicantDescription: Provide your best email and phone number.
Descriptions.textAmountPurposeDescription: Select the option that best suits your company's needs.
Descriptions.textEnterAssetsCanOffered: Enter the assets that can be offered as collateral
Descriptions.textUpdateCompanyPartnerInformation: Update the company's partners' data and send the required documents.

Phrases.phraseYourCreditRequestHasBeenReceived: Your credit request has been received and has been sent for analysis by our team. We have sent an email to
Phrases.phraseWithInformationNextSteps: with information on the next steps of your operation.
Phrases.phaseAppreciateThTrustPlacedInOurService: We appreciate the trust placed in our services and we are eager to support the growth of your company.
Phrases.phraseLinkYouAreTryngNoLongerExists: The link you are trying to access does not exist or has expired.
Phrases.phraseButYouCanRequestNewLink: But you can request a new link by clicking the button below.
Phrases.phraseErrorOccurredWhileSendingNewLink: An error occurred while sending the new link. Please try again later.
Phrases.phraseYourAccessHasBeenSuccessfullyRegis: Your access has been successfully registered. You can now log in to your account. We have sent a confirmation email to
Phrases.phraseLinkYouTryingExpired: The link you are trying to access has expired.
Phrases.phraseYourRequestNewLinkSuccessful: Your request for a new link was successful. We have sent an email to
Phrases.phraseWithInformationInstructions: with the information and instructions to access your account.
Phrases.phraseNoPendingIssuesFoundAtTheMoment: No pending issues found at the moment.
Phrases.phraseSentPasswordRecoveryEmail: We have sent a password recovery email to

Validations.textPasswordMustBeLeastEightCharacters: The password field must be at least eight characters long
Validations.textErrorOccurredWhileSendingLink: An error occurred while sending the link. Please try again later.
Validations.textErrorOccurredWhileUpdatingInformatio: An error occurred while updating the information. Please try again later.

StepsDescriptions.stepCredentialRegistration: In this step, you register your password to access the Client Dashboard.
StepsDescriptions.stepPreAnalysis: In this step, we are evaluating your request to return with the best proposal.
StepsDescriptions.stepDocumentAnalysis: In this step, we analyze the necessary documentation to carry out the credit operation.
StepsDescriptions.stepTechnicalVisitVideocall: In this phase, we hold a meeting to get to know your business better.
StepsDescriptions.stepCommittee: In this step, your proposal is sent for consideration by AFA Finance's financial committee.
StepsDescriptions.stepChecklist: In this step, we check all the documentation sent to proceed with the operation.
StepsDescriptions.stepApproved: In this step, your operation is approved and there is very little left for the release of credit.
StepsDescriptions.stepContractSigning: This is the final step that precedes the release of credit, with the signing of the contract.
StepsDescriptions.stepReleased: Congratulations! Your credit is now available to help the development of your company.
